title: Compound Cream
description: Abou compound cream is excellent for removing a wide range of paint work defects (scratches,sand scratches,slight scratches,slight Lacquer hurt , paint swirl after polishing). It produces a smear free high gloss finish.

title: Polish Cream
description: Abou Polish cream keeps your car exterior looking new with only one application per year Delivers impressive shine and protection without rubbing or buffin, Abou polish cream is specifically made to protect your car’s paint and clear-coat finish Perfect for us on cars, fiberglass boats, RVs, and even chrom surfaces Apply polish with a damp cloth, let dry to a haze, and wipe off

title: Crystal Glue Sticks
description: Quickly heated and sturdy, quick to complete production, home repairs and daily DIY projects. After fully preheating, there will be some melted binder. With a glue gun,   It is also very easy to handle  The hot melting glue can be used to bond a great diversity of materials such as wood, plastic, glass, metal, stone, ceramic, shell, brick, paper, wicker, lace, cotton, fabric.  Good flexibility and luster, durability for daily gluing . Product features:  Fast bonding speed, strong viscosity, anti-aging, non-toxic, good thermal stability, operation. Use range:  Used in ceramics, resins, plastics, wood, paper products, toys, electronics, leather, etc. Product Name: Transparent hot melt glue stick  Stable and easy to use , also Incredibly Durable and Long lasting
